about_the_game:
The Naruto Uzumaki Starter Pack includes the following content:
- Master Character Training Pack - Naruto Uzumaki (BORUTO)
- Master Character Training Pack - Naruto Uzumaki (Last Battle)
- Master Character Training Pack - Naruto Uzumaki (Baryon Mode)
- Master Character Training Pack - Naruto Uzumaki (Young Ver.)
- Top Secret Training Set - Naruto Uzumaki
- Moonlight Scroll x10

Introducing a Starter Pack containing 4 different versions of Naruto!
Also, the Top Secret Training Set included immediately unlocks all 4 Master Characters' ninjutsu, costumes, and other rewards!

Moonlight Scrolls can be appraised at the Ninja Tools Shop to unlock new costumes, weapons, ninja tools, and more!

*Includes products that are also sold individually. Be careful of duplicate purchases.
*Once you purchase the bundle, items can be claimed from the Gift Box at the Inn.
*Moonlight Scroll x10 will be automatically received in-game. Moonlight Scrolls are consumable items and will be used via the in-game Appraisal feature.
detailed_description:
The Naruto Uzumaki Starter Pack includes the following content:
- Master Character Training Pack - Naruto Uzumaki (BORUTO)
- Master Character Training Pack - Naruto Uzumaki (Last Battle)
- Master Character Training Pack - Naruto Uzumaki (Baryon Mode)
- Master Character Training Pack - Naruto Uzumaki (Young Ver.)
- Top Secret Training Set - Naruto Uzumaki
- Moonlight Scroll x10

Introducing a Starter Pack containing 4 different versions of Naruto!
Also, the Top Secret Training Set included immediately unlocks all 4 Master Characters' ninjutsu, costumes, and other rewards!

Moonlight Scrolls can be appraised at the Ninja Tools Shop to unlock new costumes, weapons, ninja tools, and more!

*Includes products that are also sold individually. Be careful of duplicate purchases.
*Once you purchase the bundle, items can be claimed from the Gift Box at the Inn.
*Moonlight Scroll x10 will be automatically received in-game. Moonlight Scrolls are consumable items and will be used via the in-game Appraisal feature.
